channel.title: I need alot of help on my server..... please read!
channel.description:
Well im just another owner of a runescape server and i have downloaded other sources and there better then the 1 im using in some ways and completly suck in others can some 1 log onto my server and help me make things i want in my server like barrows teaching mne how to make npcs drop items etc... my sever is alamsot up 24 hrs a day 7 days a week... i take it down some days though to give my computer a break well if you decide to help me heres my stuff.
IP - 70.162.108.118 Port - 5555
source - ultimate pk[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 09:24:09 PM[/size][hr]if you have nething tht would be nice to have in a p server i will add it just post the link here=P[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 09:38:25 PM[/size][hr]okay im getting no replys.....

item.source: I need alot of help on my server..... please read!

item.title: I need alot of help on my server..... please read!
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

Well, first off to make the thing say your name at the top of the screen, open up client.java in your server source folder, then hit Ctrl+F and search for the name of the person that is currently up there and change the things in between the quotes. (make a backup of your server files before editing in case of an error occuring. (like paste everything from your client.java into another textfile like wordpad then save it. You can also change other things by searching the name of that person.

Read full topic
